item.description:
We will be meeting early in the morning at the Temple to take supplies over and set up our booth for the festival. If you would like to participate and help man our booth please talk with Ryuoh Shonin. Also sign up here on the meetup calender.

We do not know yet were our booth will be located. The festval is wonderful and a all day activity. Please join us and help spread the Dharma. Even a hour or two in the booth is a help.

You can find out more about the event by visiting there web page. http://www.lowellwaterfestival.org/
item.name: Lowell Water Festival
